root.name: Abandoned Places: A Time for Heroes
root.description: Abandoned Places is a traditional party based role playing game. The game is a sandbox / open world game, the player has no linear plot lines to follow and it is up to him where to lead his party next and what adventures and storylines to follow up.

similar_games.game: Ultima Underworld II: Labyrinth of Worlds
